text: is a town located in Sorachi Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. It is a bed town of Sapporo. As of September 2016, the town has an estimated population of 7,886, and a density of 96 persons per km². The total area is 81.49 km². ==External links== * *Official Website Category:Towns in Hokkaido
title: Nanporo, Hokkaido
